name: The Nameless Cat
description:
When a young kitten faces the threat of being named something utterly ridiculous, she is forced to take matters into her own hands...

Based on true events (kind of... haha)
How Coots got her name

Made for the 2023 Ludwig Game Jam

Controls:

Arrow keys to move
X = Attack
Z = Jump
R = Restart Level

Attack List  (because I didn't have time to do a proper tutorial lol)
X = Jab
Run + X = Strong Punch
Up + X = Uppercut
Running Up + X = Boost Uppercut
Down + X = Crouch Punch
X (in the air) = Sideways Punch
Down + X (in the air) = Slam
Up + X (in the air) = Aerial Uppercut
Up + Left/Right (in the air) = Diagonal Punch

Credits:

Nick Turner, Andre Felix, Ismael Lopez
